content: अपव्यध् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To pierce (badly); अपविद्धः शरैर्भृशं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To throw or cast in general, throw or cast off, toss away; प्रेंखयन् परिजनापविद्धया (दोलया) <ls>R. 19. 44</ls> left, let go; भुजस्तंभापविद्ध <ls>Mv. 2. 33</ls> thrown, or wielded; अपविद्धसर्वस्वा <ls>Dk. 61</ls> given or spent away; <ls>Ki. 5. 30</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 37</ls>; हृदयमशरणं मे पक्ष्मलाक्ष्याः कटाक्षैरपहृतमपविद्धं पतिमुन्मूलितं च <ls>Māl. 1. 28</ls> pierced through, distracted, overcome. {@--3@} To abandon, leave, desert, cast off (as a child, ornaments &c.); पुरा श्मशाने स्रगिवापविध्यते <ls>Mb.</ls>, <ls>Ms. 11. 41</ls>, <ls>Dk. 98</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">111.</ls>
